verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, and the <S%H899>garments,<s%> and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread;
And <S%H6950>gather<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> together to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> was <S%H6950>gathered<s%> together to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H6213>done.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7364>washed<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> on him the <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and <S%H2296>girded<s%> him with the <S%H73>girdle,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with the <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> on him, and he <S%H2296>girded<s%> him with the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and <S%H640>bound<s%> it to him therewith.
And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> on him: also he <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> the <S%H224>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4701>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head;<s%> also on the <S%H4701>turban,<s%> even on his <S%H4136>forefront,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> did he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6731>plate,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that was therein, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them.

And he <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> thereof on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> both the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot,<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.
And he <S%H3332>poured<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> on them, and <S%H2296>girded<s%> them with <S%H73>girdles,<s%> and <S%H2280>put<s%> <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> on them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H5066>brought<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And he <S%H7819>slew<s%> it; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H2398>purified<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> on it.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was on the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and their <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burned<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

But the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and his <S%H5785>hide,<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and his <S%H6569>dung,<s%> he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>
And he <S%H7819>killed<s%> it; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.
And he <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> into <S%H5409>pieces;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%> the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H5409>pieces,<s%> and the <S%H6309>fat.<s%>

And he <S%H7364>washed<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> in <S%H4325>water;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%> the <S%H854>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it was a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifice for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell,<s%> and an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram.<s%>

And he <S%H7819>slew<s%> it; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and on the <S%H931>thumbs<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and on the great <S%H931>toes<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>feet:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the <S%H451>rump,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was on the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and their <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder:<s%>

And out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread, that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake,<s%> and a <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H8081>oiled<s%> bread, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder:<s%>

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H5130>waved<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them from <S%H5921>off<s%> their <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering: they were <S%H4394>consecrations<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell:<s%> it is an offering made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2373>breast,<s%> and <S%H5130>waved<s%> it for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration<s%> it was <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H4490>part;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> it on <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> with him; and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> with him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H1310>Boil<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> it with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4394>consecrations,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.
And that which <S%H3498>remains<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall you <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> in <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H4394>consecration<s%> be <S%H3117>at<s%> an <S%H4390>end:<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall he <S%H3027>consecrate<s%> you.
As he has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you.

Therefore shall you <S%H3427>abide<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that you <S%H4191>die<s%> not: for <S%H3651>so<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

So <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
